formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Funktion in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'PP_EACH_EXTENSION' =-
[Syntax] PP_EACH_EXTENSION(<mac>|<template>)
[Synopsis] Execute specified template for each extension
[Description] Output the specified template for each extension associated with the specified MAC address.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:
